title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 120 x 71 cm (47 1/4 x 27 15/16 in.)
description: Vertical serpentines of flowers form an ogival framework for vignette of dancing couple along with two small animals playing the drum and zither. German verse appears below the dancing couple. Printed in reddish-brown on natural linen ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Benjamin Ginsburg. 1956-72-8.
